Rob Hurst, Executive Chef
Rob Hurst has been Shades’ executive chef since 2018. The Panama City Beach resident holds an associate of arts degree in computer science and software engineering, plus an associate of science degree in culinary management – both of which play a role in helping him succeed in the industry.
As executive chef, Rob creates new and innovative dishes, ensures food quality and health code standards are met, and handles all of the day-to-day kitchen operations. His favorite part about working at Shades is the family atmosphere he experiences while on the job and the opportunity to create memorable experiences for guests. Prior to joining Shades, Rob worked for By the Sea Resorts as an assistant food and beverage director.
Rob’s favorite dish? Pan Seared Redfish paired with the House Margarita. His hobbies include working out, spending time with family, relaxing on the beach, and of course, cooking!
Corey Jordan, Asst. General Manager
Corey Jordan joined the Shades team in 2017 as a server and transitioned to bartender eight months later after discovering his passion for creating delicious drinks for guests. Corey’s main duties are to motivate the team, as well as instill the importance of guest service and experience.
Prior to Shades, Corey served as a United States Marine and worked as an intern for a defense contractor, where he spent time alongside very bright and innovative minds. He also had stints as a cabana boy and banana boat captain, as many beach lovers do!
If he had to choose, Corey would pick the Salmon Pad Thai with extra chili oil as his favorite Shades dish. When he’s not at the restaurant, he enjoys fishing, exploring with his dogs, beach days with his crew, cheering on his favorite sports teams and creating new cocktails.
Chrissy Parks, Hospitality Manager
A member of the team since 2020, Chrissy Parks serves as Shades' hospitality manager. In her role, the Annapolis, Maryland, native strives to provide a positive and memorable experience for all guests, as well as create a supportive environment for the team to grow and learn.
When she's off the clock, Chrissy enjoys spending time with her daughter and husband. The trio enjoys hiking, playing board games, tending to their pups, watching movies and singing tunes, as Chrissy's daughter is quite the singer. Chrissy's favorite Shades dish is the Philly Cheese Steak with mushrooms and green peppers, flash-fried grit cake and a cold glass of Matua Sauvignon Blanc.
